The 'UCL Faculty of Mathematical and Physical Sciences' is one of the 10
constituent faculties of University College London (UCL). The
Faculty, the UCL Faculty of Engineering Sciences and the UCL Faculty of the
Built Envirornment (The Bartlett) together form the UCL School of the Built
Environment, Engineering and Mathematical and Physical Sciences.

The current Dean is Professor Richard Catlow.
